scripts.test: cd server && npm run test && cd ../client && npm run test
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build && rm ../public/static -rvf && mv build/static ../public/static && mv build/* ../public
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "cd server && npm run watch" "npm run watch-node" "cd client && npm run watch"
